title: Global Network Services, Network Engineer
summary: Apple is a place where extraordinary people gather to do their best work...
description: In this fast paced role, you will provide front line support for Apple’s Data Center network to address a wide variety of business challenges...
key_qualifications:
3-5 years of experience in network troubleshooting
Extraordinary interpersonal communications and customer-service skills
Experience evaluating and managing outages to business critical infrastructure
Ability to maintain composure and customer-service focus in stressful and ambiguous situations
Ability to coordinate and troubleshoot with internal and external partner teams
Strong understanding of IPv4 and IPv6
Upstanding of BGP and OSPF routing, L2 switching technologies and ACL management
Experience with Cisco, Arista, Juniper or other vendors
Proficiency with Linux or other versions of UNIX
Knowledge of configuration management and automation technologies such as Ansible, Salt, Chef and Python, Go, etc
Experience working in large scale environments and with ITIL incident and problem management
education_experience:
- B.Sc. degree or equivalent experience
- Cisco CCNA/CCNP, Juniper JNCIA/JNCIP, or equivalent experience
